title: Drawing, "Design for a Monochrome Wall Painting in the Church of Corpus Domini in Bologna Showing the Death of St. Caterina Vigri", 1687–94
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, squared for enlargement in black chalk
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: The reclining saint playes the violin surrounded by four angels. One of the three nuns kisses the feet of the saint.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monochrome Wall Painting in the Church of Corpus Domini in Bologna Showing the Death of St. Caterina Vigri", 1687–94.
1687–94. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, squared for enlargement in black chalk. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6432.
